subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets scored three runs on a two-out ninth-inning home run to tie the game and then scored three more times in the 10th inning to complete a four-game sweep in Atlanta.
snippet: The Mets scored three runs on a two-out ninth-inning home run to tie the game and then scored three more times in the 10th inning to complete a four-game sweep in Atlanta.
